summary: Initialize Ruby SDK with scaffolding, bare-bones client for starting/executing workflows, and Ruby/Rust bridge. Excludes full RBS signatures, complete gRPC service set, and advanced features like payload codecs.
userImpact: Enables Ruby developers to start using the Temporal Ruby SDK with basic workflow starting and execution capabilities.
proposedFix: Implement scaffolding (proto gen, build, lint, docs, test, GitHub actions), Ruby/Rust bridge, bare-bones client with minimal gRPC calls, workflow handle, basic interceptor, and test infrastructure with local ephemeral server.
resolutionDetails: Issue closed after implementing the requested scaffolding and bare-bones client for the Ruby SDK.
keyQuote: Need the scaffolding and initial client for this repo. Namely: Proto gen, build, lint, docs, test, etc tasks; Ruby/Rust bridge; Bare-bones start/exec-workflow-only client.
